DOC.brief_summary: Omega DUROS® is an implantable drug delivery system designed to deliver omega interferon subcutaneously at a constant rate for 90 days. This study is being performed to evaluate the safety and antiviral effects of omega interferon delivered by the Omega DUROS® device in combination with ribavirin in subjects with chronic Hepatitis C genotype 1.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1b Study of Omega DUROS® in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C Who Relapsed After Prior Treatment
DOC.criteria: Chronic Hepatitis C with HCV genotype 1 infection Relapse following an end of treatment response after treatment with a pegylated interferon and ribavirin. Presence or history of nonHCV chronic liver disease Treatment with any interferon subsequent to the relapse with pegylated interferonalpha and ribavirin Decompensated liver disease
